title: How to Contact & Make Complaints to Vodafone UK

steps.title: Dial the number.
steps.content: Dial the number. There are many numbers to contact Vodafone. Only some numbers are toll-free, so pick the easiest/cheapest number for you: 191 from your Vodafone mobile 03333 040 191 from other UK landlines or mobiles (standard call charges apply) +44 7836 191 191 from abroad (free from a Vodafone mobile) 08080 034 515 for broadband support (free from all UK landlines and mobiles), with lines open between 8 am and 11 pm, seven days a week

steps.title: Contact them at the right time.
steps.content: Contact them at the right time. You can contact Vodafone's advisers Monday to Sunday, 8 am - 9 pm.

steps.title: Contact them via Twitter.
steps.content: Contact them via Twitter. You can tweet to @VodafoneUK about your problems. Or, send a direct message to @VodafoneUK . A representative will often follow up with help or advice about what to do next.

steps.title: Contact them via Facebook.
steps.content: Contact them via Facebook. Go to Vodafone's Facebook page and get in touch with Vodafone.

steps.title: Go to the Vodafone forums.
steps.content: Go to the Vodafone forums. You can go Vodafone's official community by clicking on https://forum.vodafone.co.uk/

steps.title: Join the community.
steps.content: Join the community. Simply log in/register. Use your email address to sign up.

steps.title: Confirm your registration.
steps.content: Confirm your registration. Log in to your email account and click the red button from the confirmation email to complete your registration.

steps.title: Ask questions.
steps.content: Ask questions. Use the search bar to find answers to your question. If you can't find your answer, click on the Ask your question (under the search box) button to create a post.

steps.title: Fill out the form.
steps.content: Fill out the form. Add a subject in the first box and select a category from the second box. Write down your problem in the third box.

steps.title: Post your message.
steps.content: Post your message. If you want to add files, like screenshots, select "Choose Files"' and select them from your device. Hit the Post Message button and wait for the reply. If you want to receive email notifications when someone replies, click to mark "Email me when someone replies."
